import boxShadows from"assets/theme-dark/base/boxShadows";import typography from"assets/theme-dark/base/typography";import colors from"assets/theme-dark/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme-dark/base/borders";// Material Dashboard 2 PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme-dark/functions/pxToRem";import rgba from"assets/theme-dark/functions/rgba";var md=boxShadows.md;var size=typography.size;var text=colors.text,transparent=colors.transparent,light=colors.light,dark=colors.dark,gradients=colors.gradients,background=colors.background,white=colors.white;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var autocomplete={styleOverrides:{popper:{boxShadow:md,padding:pxToRem(8),fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main,textAlign:"left",backgroundColor:"".concat(background.card," !important"),borderRadius:borderRadius.md},paper:{boxShadow:"none",backgroundColor:transparent.main},option:{padding:"".concat(pxToRem(4.8)," ").concat(pxToRem(16)),borderRadius:borderRadius.md,fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main,transition:"background-color 300ms ease, color 300ms ease","&:hover, &:focus, &.Mui-selected, &.Mui-selected:hover, &.Mui-selected:focus":{backgroundColor:rgba(light.main,0.2),color:white.main},'&[aria-selected="true"]':{backgroundColor:"".concat(rgba(light.main,0.2)," !important"),color:"".concat(white.main," !important")}},noOptions:{fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main},groupLabel:{color:dark.main},loading:{fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main},tag:{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",height:"auto",padding:pxToRem(4),backgroundColor:gradients.dark.state,color:white.main,"& .MuiChip-label":{lineHeight:1.2,padding:"0 ".concat(pxToRem(10)," 0 ").concat(pxToRem(4))},"& .MuiSvgIcon-root, & .MuiSvgIcon-root:hover, & .MuiSvgIcon-root:focus":{color:white.main,marginRight:0}},popupIndicator:{color:text.main},clearIndicator:{color:text.main}}};export default autocomplete;
